Tab.NoQuestionsPosted: Q&A session is live... Ask away!
Tab.WelcomeText: Welcome to Ask Away! We’re glad you’re here.
Tab.WelcomeSubText: Ask away is your tool to create and manage Q&A sessions.
Tab.ConfigTabText: Select save to finish adding ask away to the meeting
Tab.RemoveTextNotification: You can just add stuff here if you want to clean up when removing the tab. For instance, if you have stored data in an external repository, you can delete or archive it here. If you don't need this remove page you can remove it.
Tab.RemoveHeaderText: You're about to remove your tab...

MeetingPanel.BannerText: Connection lost. Refresh to view content. if that doesn't do the trick, try again later.

popups.notificationContent: Select the Ask Away icon at the top of the meeting view to participate
